This mod adds more furniture to UN-Colony mod. [h1]Needs UN-Colony as core :[/h1] https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2019774245
For the moment this mod adds :
[h1]3 complete sets of furniture[/h1] (Wood log for tribes, wood planks looking and steel. Glass furniture and advanced one are not complete yet, you will find only the tables for the moment) : - 1X1, 2X1, 2X2, 3X1 and 3X2 Tables, - A 1X1 small bedroom table, - A office desk or meeting table (good if you use the mod psychology) - Dining chairs, stools and armchairs(or office chairs), - Beds and double beds, - End tables (or Chest) and Dressers (or lockers).
[h1]3 complete sets of surgery[/h1] (The same, advanced stuff will come later) : - Medical beds, - Surgery tools (use them as vitals monitor), - Surgery light, - Surgery table.
[h1]3 complete sets of research furniture :[/h1] - Research bench (0,5 speed for tribes, 0,6 in wood, 0,7 in steel), - Research upgrades (10% speed bonus for each : Tribal calendar, wooden library, files lockers and blueprint table).
[h1]12 Lights :[/h1] - Electric torch lights or spots, - Wall lights, - Street lights.
[h1]9 temperature devices :[/h1] - 3 vents of a new kind : you place them directly on the existing walls, without to remove it, - 1 electric fan (use it as an electric passive cooler) - 2 coolers of a new kind : To place directly on the existing walls, - 2 wall heaters (Place them as the wall lights), - 1 central heating to warm large space.
[h1]And some decorations :[/h1] - 9 Carpets 2X1 sized, 9 2X2 and 9 3X3 sized, from Hay, Cloth or Synthread. - Flags, - Banners, - Warning signs.
The mod is not complete yet and your proposal are welcome ! Coming Soon : Glass set of furniture, advanced set of furniture, advanced surgery equipment, carpets, fire pits...
Hope you will enjoy !
